title: ENT Residency
description:
Welcome to the ENT Residency App - World's largest online learning program for OtoRhinoLaryngology at a PG level.

A SMART way of learning ENT quickly with the help of simple videos, diagrams, images and flow-charts. The courses make complex intricate concepts very easy to understand and remember. The conceptual videos for each topic are made after intense research covering recent as well as old editions of all standard textbooks and journals in ENT. There are courses for both theory and clinical aspects of ENT residency.

This is the only comprehensive learning program in ENT which gives everything under one roof. From all aspects of theory, clinicals, basic sciences, audiology, radiology, micro-, histopathology, case discussions, case scenarios to recent advances and many more! The recent advances are discussed like never done in any other platform.

Our OBJECTIVES -
1. Make learning ENT easy and quick
2. Make complex ENT anatomy simple
3. Provide easily reproducible diagrams
4. Cover all important questions
5. Help students write crisp answers in a point-wise manner
6. Help residents clear the final exams of MS, DLO, DNB, MRCS-ENT, DOHNS, FCPS, MCPS
7. Save valuable time in the run-up to exams
8. Provide quick and easy revision before exams
9. To provide all information needed on a single platform without students having to refer to multiple thick incomplete books. The resident can utilize the time saved for acquiring surgical skills and gathering work exposure.
10. The ultimate GOAL is to help the students pass their final ENT post-graduate exams with flying colors.

The App offers VIDEO-BASED EDUCATION plus
1. Simple hand drawn DIAGRAMS for subscribers to practise
2. FLOW-CHARTS for various topics
3. Mock written exams
4. Previous years' question papers of various universities
5. Discussions on Recent Advances in ENT

The App features the following Courses -
1. The Flagship course - ENT Mastery Course (1 year and 3 years)
2. Fast-Track ENT 6 months
3. Clinical SLAYER (1 year and 3 years)
4. Anatomy Maestro
5. Easy Diagrams & Flow-Charts
6. 1 month trial pack for Mastery

Useful for
1. Post-graduate students in ENT (MS-ENT, DLO, DOHNS, MRCS-ENT, PCPS, MCPS)
2. Students preparing for MCh after MS-ENT (NEET-SS aspirants)
3. Students preparing for European and other board exams in ENT

Studying ENT is difficult from books because-
1. Complex anatomy involved
2. Intriguing courses of nerves
3. An ever-expanding range of topics under ENT
4. No single book discusses all topics comprehensively
5. Lack of time for studies during PG time

Instructional videos make learning better because they
1. Are retained easier
2. Facilitate increased understanding
3. Make complex things clearer
4. Help to master the content faster
5. Watch anytime anywhere as per your convenience

Follow us on
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/worldentcare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ent_residency
YouTube: https://tinyurl.com/entresidency
Website: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZCNNrWgopXKW_6jSey2ZQg
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/appresidency

Trusted by innumerable PG students in India and overseas. Our overseas students include those from the UK, Brazil, Belgium, Germany, Portugal, Denmark, Spain, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, Oman, Saudi Arabia, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Serbia, Azerbaijan, US, Barbados, Trinidad and Tobago, South Africa, Australia and Canada.

developer: ENT Residency by Dr. Mehak & Dr. Shyam
